pullRequest.title: Feature/assessment/feedback for missing element
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


It is only possible to add feedback and partial assessment for existing submission elements but what if the student left something out and the tutor needs to assess this missing element?!
Description

Allow tutors to create unreferenced feedback for missing submission elements for text and modeling exercises
Steps for Testing the complete assessment process of modeling and text exercises!

prerequisite: a student submitted a text and a modeling exercise that is ready to assess

Navigate to tutor dashboard and click on start assessment
click on "add feedback" to add an unreferenced feedback for the missing element of the submission that you would like to ass
enter the points the text of this feedback
click on save
click on submit
view the results as a student and make sure you can see the unreferenced feedback
go back to the submission to override your assessment
change the assessment by adjusting the feedback text/ score or completely removing the unreferenced feedback
make sure the points are adjusted according to your updated assessment
go back to students view and check that the student can see your overridden assessment as well

Screenshots


Assessment View for Missing Submission Elements:

Modeling Exercise View:

Text Exercise Result View:

add unreferenced feedback for modeling exercises assessment
remove filtering of unreferenced feedback from modeling assessment API
filter unreferenced feedback from the feedback array sent to apollon
when finding the general feedback filter check that it is not unreferenced feedback
show unreferenced feedback in students result view
get all unreferenced feedback for the student result view text exercises and add correct translation for "Feedback for missing Elements"
compute total score in modeling-assessment-editor.component.html instead of modeling-assessment.component.ts
emit change when removing an unreferenced feedback
adjust test cases to test the unreferenced feedbacks

nodes.bodyText: Could you remove the whole method since it doesn't have a purpose anymore?
feedbackElement.reference == null should be redundant here, since FeedbackType.MANUAL_UNREFERENCED already implies that, right?

The method calculateTotalScore could be shortened to:
this.totalScore = (this.feedback || []).reduce((totalScore, feedback) => totalScore + feedback.credits!)
This case is already covered by the following if statement.

commit.message: apply eist tutors feedback regarding the result UI
adjust if condition for general feedback to check if it not unreferenced feedback

nodes.bodyText: Should we rather show a box for each element?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -61,7 +61,18 @@
- +
+ +   + Feedback for Missing Elements: +
+
